name: Harold Tales - End A
description:
This is quite the unchivalrous thing to do, but honestly… if I don’t act like the big bad evil guy, I won’t be able to get him to fight seriously. I’m not gunning for comedy wak wak like batty does. So I gotta take this seriously.

Seriously!

Ahem! Let me just… adjust my voice a bit…

*cough*

Prepare yourself, hero! Show me your best battle!

…Aw man! This voice is AWESOME! No one can tell me apart now! And to think we used to be twins.

origuessyouREALLYcan'ttellapartanyvoicesincethereisnovoicetobeginwithbutthat'sbesidethepoint.

Anyways, it's go time. Let’s go!

Oh and also I got this queer guy who had the hots for the hero that I’m just gonna put as my bodyguard just cuz. Though he’d better not kill anyone anymore! I’m the only one that gets to die today baby!

Or if the puppetmasters can’t get the hero to me for some reason. This world’s not an easy one, let me tell you.

---------------

Controls

C/Enter - Select

X/Esc - Cancel

Arrow Keys = Move
